DOC.brief_summary: Epidurally administer Depodur provide equal superior analgesia epidural infusion fentanyl first 48 hour cesarean section .
DOC.brief_title: Depodur v Fentanyl Infusion Post-C/S Analgesia
DOC.criteria: Healthy pregnant woman ( ASA I II ) schedule elective cesarean section Patient appropriate regional anesthesia Patient agree receive regional anesthesia Patient willing epidural infusion medication two day postoperatively Morbid obesity History sleep apnea Allergy opioids medication History opioids use week prior procedure Emergency cesarean section Significant surgical complication Contraindication refusal regional anesthesia Age less 18
